businessInfo.name: FOMUS - Premium Japanese Crafts
businessInfo.description: FOMUS brings 1300 years of Japanese masu tradition to the world. Premium handcrafted wooden products made from hinoki cypress. Exclusive KUKU entertainment collection and membership services. Curated for discerning collectors worldwide.
businessInfo.shortDescription: Premium Japanese crafts meets global entertainment. Traditional masu, KUKU characters, exclusive membership.

posts.title: New MASU Collection Launch
posts.description: Discover our premium hinoki cypress masu, handcrafted with 1300 years of tradition

posts.title: Exclusive Member Benefits
posts.description: Join FOMUS membership for special access to limited collections

faq.question: What is a Japanese masu?
faq.answer: A masu is a traditional Japanese wooden measuring cup used for drinking sake, with over 1300 years of history. FOMUS creates premium masu from selected hinoki cypress wood.

faq.question: Do you ship internationally?
faq.answer: Yes, we ship worldwide. All products are carefully packaged using traditional Japanese methods to ensure safe delivery.

faq.question: Can I create custom designs?
faq.answer: Absolutely! We offer fully customized masu with your logo, text, or design. Minimum order quantities apply.
